
To create a set if Debian .deb files run debuild in the
folder above this. You may need to edit the control and
changelog. Here are some of the steps needed to get to
this point:

Find the revision number from svn.
do a mkdir espr_12.6.XXXX
rsync --exclude .svn --exclude .git -av multicon5 espr_12.6.XXXX
tar cf espr_12.6.XXXX.tar espr_12.6.XXXX
gzip -9 espr_12.6.XXXX.tar
mkdir to_build_12.6
cp espr_12.6.XXXX.tar.gz to_build_12.6
cd to_build_12.6
tar xfz espr_12.6.XXXX.tar.gz
ln -s espr_12.6.XXXX.tar.gz espr_12.6.XXXX.orig.tar.gz
cd espr_12.6.XXXX
mkdir debian
 put the svn debian files into this folder

debuild
cd debian
nedit changelog
nedit control
